name: Shooting Pong
description:
The simple and fun pong game with an innovative touch.

This game is still in developing, so please help us improving the game; all feedbacks are welcome. 

Play against the AI or with a friend.
Choose one of the 4  game modes.
Personalize your controls
Have fun!

Version 2.0

Planned updates:

  • Re-designe all UI and user experience    DONE
  • Design a better instruction screen
  • Create leaderboard for alien mode
  • NEW GAME MODE
  • Optimize the game (that's really needed)

Stay tuned on  Discord  #updates

You can get a digest of the uploaded file on  our Discord Channel.

System Requirements:

MacOS:

  • OS X 10.7 or higher; tested on macOS Sierra and macOS High Sierra;
  • 40 MB of free space on your hard disk
  • 400 MB of free memory (RAM) when you play the game

Windows:

  • tested on Windows 10; very likely to work on older systems
  • 40 MB of free space on your hard disk
  • 400MB of free memory (RAM) when you play the game
